title: CHAPTER 1. Trial Jury Selection and Management Act [190 - 242]
path: CHAPTER 1. Trial Jury Selection and Management Act [190 - 242]

rule.text: 192. This chapter applies to the selection of jurors, and the formation of trial juries, for both civil and criminal cases, in all trial courts of the state.(Repealed and added by Stats. 1988, Ch. 1245, Sec.
